trait.name: Description
trait.text: Instead of choosing one of the game's races for your character at 1st level, you can use the following traits to represent your character's lineage, giving you full control over how your character's origin shaped them: Source: Tasha's Cauldron of Everything p. 8

trait.name: Creature Type
trait.text: You are a humanoid. You determine your appearance and whether you resemble any of your kin.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: You are Small or Medium (your choice).

trait.name: Feat
trait.text: You gain one feat of your choice for which you qualify.

trait.name: Variable Trait
trait.text: You gain one of the following options of your choice: (a) darkvision with a range of 60 feet or (b) proficiency in one skill of your choice.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language that you and your DM agree is appropriate for your character.
